Object.Name: IPSO Gateway System
Object.Description1: This IPSO Object defines the basic settings for a generic gateway.

Item.Name: Hostname
Item.Description: This resource type returns the hostname of the gateway.

Item.Name: Timezone
Item.Description: This resource type returns the default timezone.

Item.Name: DNS Server List
Item.Description: This resource type returns a list of DNS Servers used by this system.

Item.Name: NTP Server List
Item.Description: This resource type returns a list of NTP Servers.
